about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive signing solution designed to handle a variety of document processing needs. It allows you to incorporate text, images, digital certificates, and stamps into over 60 different file formats, including PDF, MS Office, images, and ZIP files. Additionally, signed documents can be easily searched, verified, edited, or deleted when necessary.

more_features.title: Optimize or secure document content with signatures
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is built to sign all major file formats, offering you the ability to add, adjust, verify, or remove various types of signatures with ease.

feature_1.title: Add signatures to your documents
feature_1.content: Easily place Text, Image, Barcode, QR-Code, or Stamp signatures on any page of supported documents. You can also insert or edit hidden metadata, such as EXIF in images. Protect your document content from unauthorized alterations with digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Locate and verify signatures
feature_2.content: Post-signing, your document can undergo multiple verifications. Confirm the integrity of the signed content, or conduct a detailed search to list all existing signatures.

feature_3.title: Revise existing signatures
feature_3.content: Most signature types allow for post-creation edits. You can easily modify text, reposition elements, adjust colors, resize, and make other necessary changes.

feature_4.title: Eliminate unnecessary signatures
feature_4.content: Our solution enables full CRUD operations for signatures. If required, you can remove various signature types, including digital certificates, from your document.

formats.title: Sign documents across multiple formats
formats.description: The {{EnvName}} API supports over 60 formats, enabling you to apply a range of signatures on any page, enforce content security with digital certificates, and manage signatures within the document effectively.

operations.title: Get to know our main functions
operations.description: We proudly support a comprehensive suite of signature options and functionalities
